sentences.english: The three expansion stages of early ancient seal character lines .
sentences.chinese: 早期大篆线条拓展的三个阶段。

sentences.english: Large Seal Script here refers to the Spring and Autumn period of Qin prevailed in the text.
sentences.chinese: 这里的大篆指通行于春秋战国时期的秦国文字。

sentences.english: Large Seal Script of the artworks, generally considered to be "Ancient Proses on Stones."
sentences.chinese: 大篆的真迹，一般认为是“石鼓文”。

sentences.english: The calligraphers inherit and develop on the traditional ancient seal character .
sentences.chinese: 历代大篆书法家对传统的继承和创新。

sentences.english: Seal is divided into Dazhuan and Xiaozhuan, is a Chinese book-an important stage.
sentences.chinese: 篆书又分为大篆和小篆，是汉字书体发的主要阶段。

definition: seal script as unified by the Qin dynasty/the small seal 小篆 and great seal 大篆
clerical script/official script (Chinese calligraphic style)
the small or lesser seal, the form of Chinese character standardized by the Qin dynasty
early form of Chinese characters inscribed in stone, a precursor of the small seal 小篆[xiao3 zhuan4]
seal script used throughout the pre-Han period
calligraphic style/font

bird writing, a calligraphic style based on seal script 篆书, but with characters decorated as birds and insects
